column5: and some were thrown from their chairs

column9: so near the open gap in the rail

column11: were thrown violently side-ways and there being nothing at hand to hold to
column12: or to prevent their going over the side
column13: they fell into the dark sea.Feeling as if the earth had dropped from under her

column15: as he had been doing when the impact of a larger vessel came upon the yacht
